text: tavada (nabivaraya,) numba ovun veta samgnavak nogena ve nam ‘numba eya gena a yutu novedæyi ovuhu vimasuvoya. ma pilipadinuye mage paramadhipatigen ma veta danvanu labana dæ pamanaya. meya numbalage paramadhipatigen vu pæhædili sadhakayaki. tavada mangapenvimaki. tavada visvasa karana janaya venuven vu dayavaki yæyi numba pavasanu
